name: About:,About:blank & About:neterror //Bright Color
description:
/*
 * About:,About:blank & About:neterror // Bright Color Skin, by *Snow*
 *
 * Author			  : *Snow*
 * Updated		       : August 10, 2008
 * Website			: http://userstyles.org/users/7680
 * Description		      : A complete redesign of the Firefox "about", "about:blank" and "about:neterror" page
 * Usage			 : Use with the 'Stylish' Firefox extension (http://userstyles.org/)
 * 
 * Please submit all bug reports, comments and requests.
 *
 * Feel free to use this style to develop your own theme, or to
 * make improvements on this one. I just ask that you let me know when
 * you do, so that I can look at what you've come up with.
 *
 * Note: In this skin, you can change the color of the background by changing the hexadecimal values in the background-color field.
 */

Based on style 6430, I made some modifications.

First: Now this skins supports the about:, about:blank and about:neterror pages on Firefox
Second: I made a new design on the neterror page container bg
Third: This is the most important mod that I made. Now you can "change" the color background. There is a field on the css where you can change the hex code.

html {
       background-color:#xxxxxx  !important;
}

You can choose what color is more convenient for your skin.

I made a "dark" version on this page: style 6541

Note: This is a "light" version of the CSS. The original one can be found here: http://snowpato.googlepages.com/aboutbright.css
